sourceMeaningMnemonic: You put a <radical>lid</radical> on a dish you're cooking, made up of the <radical>mouth</radical>s and <radical>forehead</radical>s of a <radical>pig</radical>. This is truly and <kanji>exceptional</kanji> dish you are cooking up.
meaningInfo: Mix those pig mouths and foreheads in your pot. Think of how exceptional your soup looks.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Exceptional</kanji> pig mouth forehead soup is a favorite of Grandpa <ja><reading>ごう</reading>いち</ja>. You see him sniffing around your window, then he knocks and waves.
readingInfo: "Can I have some of your exceptional soup?" Grandpa <ja>ごういち</ja> asks. "It smells so swell."
